verses.roman:
deśa-pātra dekhi' mahāprabhu dhairya ha-ila
āḍāilera ghāṭe naukā āsi' uttarila

synonyms: deśa-pātra dekhi'-seeing the circumstances; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhairya ha-ila—became calm; āḍāilera ghāṭe—at the shore of the village Āḍāila; naukā—the boat; āsi'-coming; uttarila—landed.
translation: Seeing the circumstances, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu finally became calm so that the boat was able to reach the shore of Āḍāila and land there.
